tips.title: Jump Around in Files
tips.description:
Use **<leader>j** prefix for Flash jump commands:

- `<leader>jj` - Flash Jump to any visible text
- `<leader>jf` - Flash forward to character
- `<leader>jF` - Flash backward to character
- `<leader>jt` - Flash forward till character
- `<leader>jT` - Flash backward till character
- `<leader>jS` - Flash Treesitter (jump to syntax nodes)

tips.title: Tmux Clipboard Integration
tips.description:
Seamlessly copy/paste between Neovim and tmux:

- `<leader>tc` (visual mode) - Copy selection to tmux & system clipboard
- `<leader>tp` (normal mode) - Paste from tmux buffer

Both commands use OSC 52 for cross-platform clipboard sync!

tips.title: Show Hidden Files in Picker
tips.description:
When using Snacks file picker windows, press **Alt-A** to toggle hidden files visibility.

This is useful for finding dotfiles and other hidden configuration files!

tips.title: Clear Search Highlighting
tips.description:
After searching with `/` or `?`, clear the search highlighting with **<leader>ur**.

This removes the distracting highlights while keeping your search in history for `n`/`N` navigation.

tips.title: Find and Replace (Substitution)
tips.description:
Use the substitute command to find and replace text:

- `:s/old/new/` - Replace first occurrence on current line
- `:s/old/new/g` - Replace all occurrences on current line
- `:%s/old/new/g` - Replace all occurrences in entire file
- `:%s/old/new/gc` - Replace with confirmation for each match
- `:'<,'>s/old/new/g` - Replace in visual selection

Add `\c` for case-insensitive: `:%s/old/new/gi`
